articles.summary: Western forces running the Afghan airlift braced on Saturday for more attacks after the United States launched a drone strike, apparently killing an Islamic State "planner", two days after the group claimed a deadly bombing outside Kabul airport. articles.title: Arc de Triomphe to be wrapped in fabric for posthumous artwork
articles.excerpt: The work will realise a project first conceived 60 years ago by the late collaborating couple known as Christo and Jeanne-Claude.
